word:
How was it with Ephesus? She knew not the time of her visitation. She did not heed the solemn admonitions of God. She did not maintain a vital connection with Christ, and grievous wolves entered in, and spared not the flock. The church, once beloved of God, that might have sent her 


                                   -104- 

bright rays amid the moral darkness to enlighten many souls, permitted her light to go out.
